title: FUBAR Internet Blocker 2014 v2
description:
FUBAR Internet Blocker 2014 v2
------------------------------

As the name says, this application will block internet-access.

When you run this application, you will get 1 (ONE!!) warning.
Th setup takes a few seconds, and you will be given a message when the application is done.

The changes are effective immediately! Once all browsers has been closed.
Any open browser-windows will still be able to access all sites that you have browsed in that current session.
Once they are closed, the changes will take effect on those as well.

Simple as that! :)
So far, 435 sites are being blocked.



Here is how to remove it:
1. Open Notepad, as Administrator.
2. Open the file "%win%/system32/drivers/etc/hosts".
(Remember to change / to backslash)
3. Delete all lines beginning with "127.0.0.1".


/Ubehage
